document_data.name: ''Stamp of the Messenger''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''stamp of the messenger''''' was a [[magic]] seal that produced its own sealing wax.
document_data.Description: The seal was made from [[silver]] or [[gold]].
document_data.Powers: The silver form of this item made its own sealing wax. The gold form sealed a message and caused it to animate, sprout wings, and fly to the intended recipient or destination. For this to work the item needed to weigh less than {{SI|0.5|lb|long=yes}} and the target needed to be within {{SI|2|mi|k|long=yes}} when the item animated.
